detaileddescription.para: Sequential.
Interleaved.

briefdescription.para: Packing scheme.

detaileddescription.para: Input data path.
Output data path.

briefdescription.para: ISO data path direction.

detaileddescription.para: HCI data path.
Vendor Specific data path.
Total number of data path methods.
Data path is disabled.

briefdescription.para: ISO data path.

detaileddescription.para: Data path input bit.
Data path output bit.

briefdescription.para: ISO data path direction bit.
Used by a broadcaster host to command is used to create one or more BISes of a BIG in the controller.
Used by a broadcaster host to command is used to create one or more BISes of a BIG in the ISO test mode.
Used to terminate the transmission of all BISes of a BIG, or to cancel the process of creating a BIG using the HCI_LE_Create_BIG command from the Isochronous Broadcaster.
Used to synchronize and receive PDUs from one or more BISes within a BIG.
Used to stop synchronization with the BIG or to cancel the process of synchronizing to BISes invoked by the HCI_LE_BIG_Create_Sync command.
Used by a master host to set the parameters of all connected isochronous streams associated with a connected isochronous group in the controller.

parameterdescription.para: Return buffer for the connected isochronous handles.

briefdescription.para: Used by a master Host to set the parameters of all connected isochronous streams associated with a connected isochronous group in the controller for testing purpose.

parameterdescription.para: Return buffer for the connected isochronous handles.

briefdescription.para: Used by the master host to establish one or more connected isochronous streams.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters for create connected isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Removes all the connected isochronous streams which have previously been set up.

parameterdescription.para: Identifier of the connected isochronous group.

briefdescription.para: Used by the slave host to inform the controller to accept the request for the connected isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Handle of the connected isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Used by the slave host to inform the controller to reject the request for the connected isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Handle of the connected isochronous stream.
Indicate the reason for rejecting the request.

briefdescription.para: Read the Time_Stamp and Time_Offset of a transmitted ISO_SDU identified by the Packet_Sequence_Number on a CIS or BIS identified by the Connection_Handle.
Used to request the Controller to configure the data transport path in a given direction between the Controller and the Host.
Used to identify and enable the isochronous data path between the host and the controller for each connected isochronous or broadcast isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Parameters for setup ISO data path.

briefdescription.para: Used to remove the isochronous data path associated with the connected isochronous or broadcast isochronous stream.

parameterdescription.para: Direction of data path to remove.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem for operation for slave connected isochronous stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the LL subsystem for use as a slave connected isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem for operation for master connected isochronous stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the LL subsystem for use as a master connected isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Initialize memory for CIS.

detaileddescription.para:
pFreeMem
Pointer to free memory.
freeMemSize
Size of pFreeMem.
Amount of free memory consumed.
This function allocates memory for CIS.

simplesect.para: This routine must be called after LlInitRunTimeCfg() but only once before any other initialization routines.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem for operation for slave broadcast isochronous stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the LL subsystem for use as a slave broadcast isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL subsystem for operation for master broadcast isochronous stream.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes the LL subsystem for use as a master broadcast isochronous stream.

briefdescription.para: Initialize memory for BIS.

detaileddescription.para:
pFreeMem
Pointer to free memory.
freeMemSize
Size of pFreeMem.
Amount of free memory consumed.
This function allocates memory for BIS.

simplesect.para: This routine must be called after LlInitRunTimeCfg() but only once before any other initialization routines.

briefdescription.para: Initialize memory for ISO.

detaileddescription.para:
pFreeMem
Pointer to free memory.
freeMemSize
Size of pFreeMem.
Amount of free memory consumed.
This function allocates memory for CIS.

simplesect.para: This routine must be called after LlInitRunTimeCfg() but only once before any other initialization routines.

briefdescription.para: Initialize LL for use with an audio codec.

detaileddescription.para: Assign codec functions for direct LL audio streaming.

briefdescription.para: Send an ISO data packet.

detaileddescription.para:
pData
Data buffer
Send an ISO data packet. pData points to an ISO buffer formatted according to [1]; the host must set the connection handle, flags, and length fields in the buffer.

briefdescription.para: Receive an ISO data packet.

detaileddescription.para:
Data buffer.
Receive an ISO data packet. If no ISO buffers are available this function returns NULL.

simplesect.para: The host must deallocate the buffer by calling WsfMsgFree() and call LlRecvBufCmpl() to update LL accounting.

briefdescription.para: Indicate that received ISO data buffer has been deallocated.

detaileddescription.para:
numBufs
Number of completed packets.
Indicate that received ISO data buffer has been deallocated.
